content.raw:
This is a huge commit to review all at once.  Can you break it up into pieces?  It seems that a natural breakdown would be:
 # CMake OGRE stuff (which I reviewed and like; I was initially put off by the use of find_path() instead of find_library(), but I understand why).
 # Header single-inclusion macro name-changing to remove extra underscores (which is fine)
 # Adding/modifying SkyX support
content.html:
This is a huge commit to review all at once. Can you break it up into pieces? It seems that a natural breakdown would be:

  1. CMake OGRE stuff (which I reviewed and like; I was initially put off by the use of find_path() instead of find_library(), but I understand why).
  2. Header single-inclusion macro name-changing to remove extra underscores (which is fine)
  3. Adding/modifying SkyX support
